Diagnosis of overt diabetes mellitus in pregnancy 
• If a pregnant woman meets any of the criteria for overt diabetes mellitus, she can be diagnosed as an overt
diabetic:
o Random glucose ≥11.1mmol/l
o Fasting glucose ≥7mmol/l
o 2-hour gl ucose on 75g-2h-OGTT ≥11.1mmol/l
o HbA1c >6.5%
